channel.title: CVE Feed for Rukovoditel -- all

item.title: CVE-2020-13590|2024-08-04T12:25:16.068Z -- rukovoditel -- project%20management%20app
item.description: Multiple exploitable SQL injection vulnerabilities exist in the 'entities/fields' page of the Rukovoditel Project Management App 2.7.2. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to SQL injection. An attacker can make authenticated HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities, this can be done either with administrator credentials or through cross-site request forgery.
